Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P3-Ll-2085  (XXA, UCLL1c; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 65% similarity toP2-Ll-1298.Activity: Active against t E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 15 uM) and S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 15 uM).Structure: Helical in 50% TFE or DPPG vesicles but not DPPC, indicating electrostatic interactions. Updated 7/2021; 10/2024
Literature Information.Author: Siano A, Humpola MV, de Oliveira E, Albericio F, Simonetta AC, Lajmanovich R, Tonarelli GG.2018
Literature Information.Title: Leptodactylus latrans Amphibian Skin Secretions as a Novel Source for the Isolation of Antibacterial Peptides.
